column3: Grilled artisan bread topped with marinated heirloom tomatoes, fresh basil, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.
Thinly sliced raw beef tenderloin with arugula, capers, shaved Parmigiano-Reggiano, and a lemon-olive oil dressing.
Lightly fried squid rings served with a spicy marinara sauce and lemon wedges.
Classic Roman dish with pancetta, eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, and cracked black pepper.
Creamy Arborio rice with porcini mushrooms, white wine, and a touch of truffle oil.
Layers of pasta with homemade Bolognese sauce, béchamel, and Parmigiano-Reggiano.
Veal escalopes wrapped in prosciutto and sage, cooked in a white wine and butter sauce.
Catch of the day, grilled to perfection, with a side of lemon-infused extra virgin olive oil.
Baked eggplant with tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, and Parmesan cheese.
Roasted rosemary potatoes with garlic and sea salt.
Seasonal grilled vegetables drizzled with balsamic reduction.
Mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, and a balsamic vinaigrette.
Classic espresso-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream and dusted with cocoa powder.
Homemade gelato, ask your server for today’s flavor selections.
Silky smooth cooked cream with vanilla bean and mixed berry coulis.
A selection of Italian wines, beers, soft drinks, and artisanal coffee.
